name: fabric (itch)
description:
Cadence loves her quilt very much...but somehow the stitches came loose and all of its pieces took to the sky! Help this little pomegranate collect fabric squares to repair her beloved blanket.

fabric is a short, single-level game made during Global Game Jam 2020 @ CCAD

Developer's Note: switching between the directional keys (A and D) can be a little sensitive in-game...if Cadence gets "frozen", try walking her in the opposite direction or let her rest for a moment before pressing another key!
